title: Find Profitable Keywords FAST on KDP
description:
Shave hours off your research time with this simple and easy technique.

If you’re anything like me, keyword research isn’t the most fun portion of the low-content publishing process. This is why I LOVE using various tools to help speed up and streamline the process. Combined with the dead simple technique I’m sharing today, uncovering profitable keywords doesn’t have to be the laborious time-suck it once was.
